alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Kanawha; Roane (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 1:42PM EDT until June 17 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Kanawha County in central West Virginia... Southwestern Roane County in central West Virginia... Southeastern Jackson County in northwestern West Virginia... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 142 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kenna, or near Ripley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ripley, Kenna, Statts Mills, Looneyville, Harmony, Given, Kentuck, Fairplain, Gay, Walton and Gandeeville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 17 and 18. Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 122 and 140. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
